snippet: He's known as a writer and director, but Quentin Tarantino's first passion was acting. In a 1997 interview with The Times Magazine, Tarantino explained how hard it was to let someone else be cast in a role he had envisioned for himself.
abstract: He's known as a writer and director, but Quentin Tarantino's first passion was acting. In a 1997 interview with The Times Magazine, Tarantino explained how hard it was to let someone else be cast in a role he had envisioned for himself.

headline.main: Past Forward: Quentin Tarantino Doesn't Always Act the Part
